channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Red Viper
channel.description:
**The Red Viper**
**Neutral Killing**
**Viper's Camoflauge(Passive)** - Immune to death at night.
**Viper's Bite(Night)** - Attack a player. The target and anybody who visited your target will be immobilzed.- Infinite Uses.
**Dying Touch(Day**) - You will poison the target with Crimson Powder, making them unable to use their night abilties and causing them to die in one night if not healed by a Physician or an Alchemist. The target will experience a nosebleed at night, meaning that they have been poisoned.- 1 use.
**Immobilize(Day)** - Your target will be unable to use his night abilities. Cannot use twice on same target.- 4 uses.
_Kill all members of the main factions._
Feedback is welcomed!

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Red Viper
item.dc:creator: DasModel
item.description:
Thanks for the feedback! I agree with your point, so I changed it.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Red Viper
item.dc:creator: Yimothy
item.description:
I like the idea of poison similar to Butler’s poison, due to not knowing if you’re going to be killed, but I’d say let Immobilize be used on the same target since it opens more opportunities when using it continually, such as preventing Butlers to keep your abilities in the late game. I assume that Immobilize bypasses through most, if not all, occupy immunities, so it can be very useful in the late game kill hustle. That’s all I have to say.

Read full topic
